short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension that replaces your new tab with one displaying today's date in Latin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension replaces your new tab with the screenshot. There's no better way to familiarize yourself with Latin ordinal numbers, days of the week, and monthly dates than to see them every day!

Features:

Roman year (ab urbe condita)
Christian year
Day of the week
Select holidays
Ordinal numbering
Mācrōns everywhere (!)
and of course the Latin monthly dating system
